name: Khoo Teck Puat National University Children's Medical Institute

reviews.text: Very children friendly hospital. Well done. Somehow I think Mr Khoo Must have donated large sum of money to support this hospital. I think he deserve some credit here.

their new location is abit of a walk along ulu walkways. Once you get there, you'll see nice friendly decor. the waiting area can be a little warm but they have fans to try to help. there are different floors and the flow of patients is pretty smooth. doctors and nurses are nice and professional

Quite Childrens Hospital
Clean and so cozy place to bring your kids to medication..

Its so fairly organized
From the registration, self (registration booth)
Payment system..untill to check it up.
Very recommended.

This NUH children medical centre is nicely decorated and very child friendly. Short waiting time from registration to triage. Doctors,  staffs, Physiotherapist are good, helpful and friendly. A special mention goes to Dr Lawrence Wang, an experienced and details doctor who serves with heart. Doctor Wang will listen to you very attentively and never rush you through the appointment. He will do his best to treat my son and tried to allocate his time to see him before his overseas trip and we really appreciate his help. We had good experiences with KTP medical centre and we hope KTP will continue to provide quality medical services to the children.

Frequently visited this place due to child health progress. But I have to say the wait is way too long. I always thought that coming on time is good. But it's a 2 hr delay from appt time. Can't complain since we have to see the doctor But will appreciate if we can better slot the time to save everyone's time
